item.title: REVE 2017 and DSPL 2017 will be held on Tuesday
The registration info can be checked here
item.description: Registration form will be published soon!

item.title: Link to the Journal
item.description: We are pleased to announce that selected papers presented at the Conference will be published in the Journal of Systems and Software (JSS). There will be an open call.
